page.title: 04Worlds End,Thornton
page.content: The principal feature of the square is farmland,used for cattle grazing and stock rearing.There are no bus stops, so there is no bus route.There is only one post-box, which is quite far for some people to walk.Also only one public telephone-box, so most families do need a phone in their own houses.A recreation site in this area provides inadequate recreation facilities for the residents,{ONLY} holding a cricket ground with no swings or slides.There are five public houses for leisure purposes.There is{ {ONLY ONE}shop which sells everything apart from newspapers and clothes.In all the farming land in this area, there are seventeen farms altogether. Mainly old people live in our area,not many people of our age group live there only a few of our friends.
